description:
An open-source alternative to Claude Cowork, powered by OpenCode

OpenWork is an extensible, open-source “Claude Work” style system for knowledge workers.
It’s a native desktop app that runs OpenCode under the hood, but presents it as a clean, guided workflow:
- pick a workspace
- start a run
- watch progress + plan updates
- approve permissions when needed
- reuse what works (templates + skills)
The goal: make “agentic work” feel like a product, not a terminal.
Highlights
- Reverted the OAuth/session change from v0.11.98 that caused regressions on some machines.
- Restored prior provider connect and session behavior while keeping the release line moving forward.
Fixes & polish
- Rolls back commit c535bb5 (OAuth port conflict/session error footer behavior) after breakage reports.
Packaging / ops
- Patch release bump to 0.11.99 across app, desktop, orchestrator, router, and server packages.
- Includes AUR metadata refresh from the current release window.
